statements: SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, frequency, start_date, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE last_payment_date IS NULL;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, frequency, start_date, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount, frequency, start_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND frequency = '1 month' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT customer_id, amount, last_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount < 500 AND last_payment_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE next_payment_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY next_payment_date;
SELECT customer_id, amount, frequency, start_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND start_date < '2023-03-01';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, customer_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, payment_id, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency = '1 month';
SELECT * FROM scheduled_tasks ORDER BY last_executed DESC;
SELECT task_name, schedule_interval FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY next_payment_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, amount, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 'CUST001'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payments > 5
SELECT task_id, task_name, last_executed FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY last_executed ASC
SELECT * FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE task_description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
SELECT payment_schedule, payment_amount, user_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_status, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM scheduled_tasks ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_amount FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_schedule FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY payment_schedule DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_time FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE interval_hours < 24;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount AS amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE scheduled_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 123 AND status = 'Success';
SELECT payment_amount FROM payment_schedule WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, user_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM scheduled_tasks ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_schedule WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id=100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount, payment_frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_schedule WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT recurring_payment_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'Success';
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_date FROM user_notifications WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_schedule WHERE status = 'Pending' AND scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, payment_frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 123 AND start_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM transaction_history WHERE status = 'Success' AND amount_paid >= 500 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_type, task_status FROM task_queue WHERE task_type = 'Billing' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
